00017 #ifdef PYTHON31
00018         #define PYINTEGER_FROMLONG(v)   PyLong_FromLong(v)
00019         #define PYINTEGER_FROMSIZE_T(v) PyLong_FromSize_t(v)
00020         #define PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)              PyLong_Check(v)
00021         #define PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v)             PyLong_AsLong(v)
00022 #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00023         #define PYINTEGER_FROMLONG(v) PyInt_FromLong(v)
00024         #define PYINTEGER_FROMSIZE_T(v) PyInt_FromLong(v)
00025         #define PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)              PyInt_Check(v)
00026         #define PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v)             PyInt_AsLong(v)
00027 #endif

00031 namespace ScriptPy

00033         using namespace reflection;

00036 
00037         bool CScriptManager::MakeAny(PyObject* obj, SScriptAny& val)
00038         {
00039                 val.clear();
00040 
00041                 if(!obj)
00042                         return false;
00043 
00044                 if(PYINTEGER_CHECK(obj))
00045                         val = SScriptAny((int) PYINTEGER_ASLONG(obj));
00046                 else if(PyFloat_Check(obj))
00047                         val = SScriptAny((float) PyFloat_AsDouble(obj));
00048                 else if(PyDict_Check(obj))
00049                 {
00050                         CScriptTable* tbl;
00051                         create_instance_impl(&tbl);
00052 
00053                         tbl->FinalConstruct(obj);
00054                         val = SScriptAny(tbl);
00055 
00056                         tbl->Release();
00057                 }
00058                 else if(PyCallable_Check(obj))
00059                 {
00060                         CScriptFunction* pFunc;
00061                         create_instance_impl(&pFunc);
00062 
00063                         pFunc->FinalConstruct(obj);
00064                         val = SScriptAny(pFunc);
00065 
00066                         pFunc->Release();
00067                 }
00068                 else
00069                 {
00070                         CScriptObject* pObj;
00071                         create_instance_impl(&pObj);
00072 
00073                         pObj->FinalConstruct(obj);
00074                         val = SScriptAny(pObj);
00075 
00076                         pObj->Release();
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 return true;
00080         }

00083 
00084         bool CScriptManager::IsBuiltIn(const reflection::type* t)
00085         {
00086                 return  (t->arch_type() == ARCH_BUILTIN ||
00087                                 (t->arch_type() == ARCH_POINTER &&
00088                                 static_cast<const pointer_type*>(t)->pointee_type()->tag() == T_CHAR) ||
00089                                 (t->arch_type() == ARCH_REFERENCE &&
00090                                 static_cast<const reference_type*>(t)->referenced_type()->arch_type() == ARCH_BUILTIN));
00091         }
00092 
00093         bool CScriptManager::IsUserDefined(const reflection::type* t)
00094         {
00095                 return t->arch_type() == ARCH_USERDEFINED ||
00096                         (t->arch_type() == ARCH_REFERENCE &&
00097                         static_cast<const reference_type*>(t)->referenced_type()->arch_type() == ARCH_USERDEFINED);
00098         }
00099 
00100         bool CScriptManager::IsPointerToBuiltin(const reflection::type* t)
00101         {
00102                 return t->arch_type() == ARCH_POINTER && static_cast<const pointer_type*>(t)->pointee_type()->arch_type() == ARCH_BUILTIN;
00103         }
00104 
00105         bool CScriptManager::IsPointerToUserDefined(const reflection::type* t)
00106         {
00107                 return t->arch_type() == ARCH_POINTER && static_cast<const pointer_type*>(t)->pointee_type()->arch_type() == ARCH_USERDEFINED;
00108         }
00109 
00111 
00112         PyObject* CScriptManager::CreateBuiltinScriptObject(reflection::ETypeTag type, void* pVal)
00113         {
00114                 PyObject* ret = 0;
00115                 switch(type)
00116                 {
00117                 case T_BOOL:
00118                         ret = PYINTEGER_FROMSIZE_T(*(bool*)pVal ? 1 : 0);
00119                         break;
00120                 case T_INT:
00121                         ret = PYINTEGER_FROMLONG(*(int*)pVal);
00122                         break;
00123                 case T_UINT:
00124                         ret = PYINTEGER_FROMLONG(*(unsigned int*)pVal);
00125                         break;
00126                 case T_LONG:
00127                         ret = PYINTEGER_FROMLONG(*(long*)pVal);
00128                         break;
00129                 case T_ULONG:
00130                         ret = PYINTEGER_FROMLONG(*(unsigned long*)pVal);
00131                         break;
00132                 case T_FLOAT:
00133                         ret = PyFloat_FromDouble(*(float*)pVal);
00134                         break;
00135                 case T_DOUBLE:
00136                         ret = PyFloat_FromDouble(*(double*)pVal);
00137                         break;
00138                 case T_POINTER:
00139                         // Strings
00140                 #ifdef PYTHON31
00141                         ret = PyUnicode_FromString(*(char**)pVal);
00142                 #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00143                         ret = PyString_FromString(*(char**)pVal);
00144                 #endif
00145                         break;
00146                 }
00147                 return ret;
00148         }

00151 
00152         bool CScriptManager::ConvertToBuiltinValue(reflection::ETypeTag type, void* pValOut, PyObject* v)
00153         {
00154                 switch(type)
00155                 {
00156                 case T_BOOL:
00157                         if(!PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)) return false;
00158                         *(bool*)pValOut = PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v) ? true : false;
00159                         return true;
00160                 case T_INT:
00161                         if(!PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)) return false;
00162                         *(int*)pValOut = PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v);
00163                         return true;
00164                 case T_UINT:
00165                         if(!PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)) return false;
00166                         *(unsigned int*)pValOut = PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v);
00167                         return true;
00168                 case T_LONG:
00169                         if(!PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)) return false;
00170                         *(long*)pValOut = PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v);
00171                         return true;
00172                 case T_ULONG:
00173                         if(!PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)) return false;
00174                         *(unsigned long*)pValOut = PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v);
00175                         return true;
00176                 case T_FLOAT:
00177                         if(PyFloat_Check(v)) {
00178                                 *(float*)pValOut = (float)PyFloat_AS_DOUBLE(v);
00179                                 return true;
00180                         }
00181                         else if(PyIndex_Check(v)) {
00182                                 *(float*)pValOut = (float)PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v);
00183                                 return true;
00184                         }
00185                         return false;
00186                 case T_DOUBLE:
00187                         if(PyFloat_Check(v)) {
00188                                 *(double*)pValOut = PyFloat_AS_DOUBLE(v);
00189                                 return true;
00190                         }
00191                         else if(PYINTEGER_CHECK(v)) {
00192                                 *(double*)pValOut = PYINTEGER_ASLONG(v);
00193                                 return true;
00194                         }
00195                 case T_POINTER:
00196                         // Strings
00197                         /*if(!PyUnicode_Check(v)) return false;
00198                         *(char**)pValOut = (char*)PyUnicode_AS_DATA(v);
00199                         return true;*/
00200                 #ifdef PYTHON31
00201                         NOT_IMPLEMENTED();
00202                 #elif defined(PYTHON26)
00203                         if(!PyString_Check(v)) return false;
00204                         *(char**)pValOut = PyString_AsString(v);
00205                         return true;
00206                 #endif
00207 
00208                 }
00209                 return false;
00210         }

00214         PyObject* CScriptManager::CreateUserDefScriptObject(const reflection::type* type, void* pVal, CScriptModule* moduleHint, InstanceType inst_t)
00215         {
00216                 // Find exported type by name, use the hint first
00217                 ExportEntry* typeEntry = FindExportedType(type->name(), moduleHint);
00218                 PyTypeObject *typeObj = &typeEntry->ClassObj;
00219 
00220                 if(!typeEntry)
00221                         return 0;
00222 
00223                 // Create instance object (same as __new__)
00224                 InstanceObject* inst_info = (InstanceObject*)typeObj->tp_alloc(typeObj, 0);
00225                 inst_info->instance = pVal;
00226                 inst_info->ctor = 0;
00227                 inst_info->inst_type = inst_t;
00228                 inst_info->object_type = typeEntry;
00229                 return (PyObject*)inst_info;
00230         }

00233 
00234         bool CScriptManager::ConvertObject(PyObject* v, value_type_pair& ret)
00235         {
00236                 const type *dataType = ret.Type;
00237                 ASSERT_STRICT(ret.Type);
00238 
00239                 if(IsBuiltIn(dataType))
00240                 {
00241                         ConvertToBuiltinValue(dataType->tag(), ret.Value, v);
00242                         return true;
00243                 }
00244                 else if(IsUserDefined(dataType))
00245                 {
00246                         *(void**)ret.Value = ExtractInstanceInfo(v)->instance;
00247                         return true;
00248                 }
00249                 else if(IsPointerToBuiltin(dataType))
00250                 {
00251                         assert(false);
00252                         return false;
00253                 }
00254                 else if(IsPointerToUserDefined(dataType))
00255                 {
00256                         *(void**)ret.Value = &ExtractInstanceInfo(v)->instance;
00257                         return true;
00258                 }
00259 
00260                 return false;
00261         }
00262 
00264 
00265         PyObject* CScriptManager::ConvertToObject(const value_type_pair& v)
00266         {
00267                 const type *dataType = v.Type;
00268 
00269                 if(IsBuiltIn(dataType))
00270                 {
00271                         return CreateBuiltinScriptObject(dataType->tag(), v.Value);
00272                 }
00273                 else if(IsUserDefined(dataType))
00274                 {
00275                         return CreateUserDefScriptObject(dataType, v.Value, 0, SIT_OWNED);
00276                 }
00277                 else if(IsPointerToBuiltin(dataType))
00278                 {
00279                         assert(false);
00280                         return 0;
00281                 }
00282                 else if(IsPointerToUserDefined(dataType))
00283                 {
00284                         return CreateUserDefScriptObject(
00285                                 static_cast<const pointer_type*>(dataType)->pointee_type(),
00286                                 *(void**)v.Value,
00287                                 0,
00288                                 SIT_SHARED);
00289                 }
00290                 // Unreachable
00291                 assert(false);
00292                 return 0;
00293         }
